articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Ex-India star fires 'Asia Cup' warning to Hardik after T20I series loss vs WI - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The former India star wants Hardik Pandya to regain his batting form in the Asia Cup.  | Cricket
articles.content: Taking responsibility after India suffered a shocking series defeat to the West Indies, stand-in skipper Hardik Pandya admitted that his batting no-show was indeed a turning point as the Men In Blue … [+2265 chars]
